cell.html: Krause is the first main character of the series. He's a well-meaning, civic-minded lawyer in his 30s, Nick is a husband, father, and son to the Darling family attorney, Devlin George. Growing up in a troubled household (his mother left when he was seven), he always came second to his father's job. Though he promised himself he would never follow in his father's footsteps, he is inevitably drawn to the Darling family when his father dies suddenly in a mysterious manner and agrees to be their chief counsel. [1]
cell.text: Krause is the first main character of the series. He's a well-meaning, civic-minded lawyer in his 30s, Nick is a husband, father, and son to the Darling family attorney, Devlin George. Growing up in a troubled household (his mother left when he was seven), he always came second to his father's job. Though he promised himself he would never follow in his father's footsteps, he is inevitably drawn to the Darling family when his father dies suddenly in a mysterious manner and agrees to be their chief counsel. [1]

cell.html: Sutherland is the second main character of the series. Tripp is the Darling family patriarch. Now in his 60s, he has amassed a wealth of such enormity that he owns vineyards and maintains residences around the world, including one in Upper East Side , Manhattan . With his wife, Letitia, they have raised five grown, troubled children: Patrick, Karen, Brian, Jeremy and Juliet. [2]
cell.text: Sutherland is the second main character of the series. Tripp is the Darling family patriarch. Now in his 60s, he has amassed a wealth of such enormity that he owns vineyards and maintains residences around the world, including one in Upper East Side , Manhattan . With his wife, Letitia, they have raised five grown, troubled children: Patrick, Karen, Brian, Jeremy and Juliet. [2]

cell.html: Letitia is the Darling family matriarch. Friends with the Vanderbilt family , she is a socialite of formidable standing in New York . Rendered devastated by Devlin George's death, the truth about the nature of their relationship comes to light when her daughter, Karen, reveals that they were engaged in a years-long affair . [3]
cell.text: Letitia is the Darling family matriarch. Friends with the Vanderbilt family , she is a socialite of formidable standing in New York . Rendered devastated by Devlin George's death, the truth about the nature of their relationship comes to light when her daughter, Karen, reveals that they were engaged in a years-long affair . [3]

cell.html: Patrick is the firstborn child of Tripp and Letitia Darling. Now in his 40s, he is the New York State Attorney General married with two kids. A rising political star, he intends to be a Senatorial candidate. There's only one glitch in the plan: he's been having a torrid affair with a transsexual who refuses to go away. [4]
cell.text: Patrick is the firstborn child of Tripp and Letitia Darling. Now in his 40s, he is the New York State Attorney General married with two kids. A rising political star, he intends to be a Senatorial candidate. There's only one glitch in the plan: he's been having a torrid affair with a transsexual who refuses to go away. [4]

cell.html: Karen Darling is the eldest daughter in the Darling family. 4 times married, she also runs the family's charitable foundation. Nick and Karen were romantically involved at one point in time (she lost her virginity to him) and the latter always thought she would end up his wife. She now resents the fact that it didn't turn out that way. [5]
cell.text: Karen Darling is the eldest daughter in the Darling family. 4 times married, she also runs the family's charitable foundation. Nick and Karen were romantically involved at one point in time (she lost her virginity to him) and the latter always thought she would end up his wife. She now resents the fact that it didn't turn out that way. [5]

cell.html: Brian Darling is the middle child of the Darling family. In his 30s, he is a priest affiliated with the Episcopal Church , even though he has an illegitimate child who he won't admit is his. Described as a "pale, sour, whiny jerk", he loathed Nick George as a child and hates him even more today. He once spitefully accused Devlin George of trying to ingratiate himself with his family, and now feels Nick is attempting to do the same. [6]
cell.text: Brian Darling is the middle child of the Darling family. In his 30s, he is a priest affiliated with the Episcopal Church , even though he has an illegitimate child who he won't admit is his. Described as a "pale, sour, whiny jerk", he loathed Nick George as a child and hates him even more today. He once spitefully accused Devlin George of trying to ingratiate himself with his family, and now feels Nick is attempting to do the same. [6]

cell.html: Jeremy Darling (along with Juliet) is half of the set of twins that make up the youngest members of Darling family. Addicted to coke , he is frequently seen hung over , chain-smoking and pleading with Nick George to get him out of a jam. Completely oblivious to other people's suffering and unable to imagine a life worse than his, Jeremy often fears that he is the family disappointment and that his father abhors him. [7]
cell.text: Jeremy Darling (along with Juliet) is half of the set of twins that make up the youngest members of Darling family. Addicted to coke , he is frequently seen hung over , chain-smoking and pleading with Nick George to get him out of a jam. Completely oblivious to other people's suffering and unable to imagine a life worse than his, Jeremy often fears that he is the family disappointment and that his father abhors him. [7]

cell.html: Juliet Darling (along with Jeremy) is half of the set of twins that make up the youngest members of the Darling family. Described as being spoiled and petulant (albeit with a heart), she is in her 20s. A former debutante , she is presently aiming to be taken seriously as an actress and was later devastated to learn that she only received the role of Susy Hendrix (once portrayed by Audrey Hepburn ) in the play, " Wait Until Dark ", because her father was bankrolling the production. [8]

[8]

context.text: List of Dirty Sexy Money characters - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
List of Dirty Sexy Money characters
These are the characters in ABC television drama, Dirty Sexy Money .
List of Dirty Sexy Money characters
Dan Rather will appear in the pilot as a reporter in his first acting role in his career. [12]
